title: Original Passport
description: Must be valid for at least 6 months beyond intended stay. Issued within last 10 years. Two blank pages.

title: Two Passport Photos
description: Recent (within 6 months), 35x45mm, matte finish, white background, 80% face coverage.

title: Round Trip Flight Itinerary
description: Confirmed reservation showing entry and exit. Do not buy actual tickets before visa approval.

title: Proof of Accommodation
description: Hotel vouchers or invitation letter from host covering the entire duration of stay.

title: Bank Statements
description: Personal bank statements for the last 3-6 months (stamped and signed by the bank).

title: Employment Proof / NOC
description: Leave sanction letter from employer (NOC) and salary slips for the last 3 months.

title: Travel Medical Insurance
description: Policy covering medical emergencies and repatriation. Minimum coverage usually $50,000 or â‚¬30,000.
